description: The chips are truly down for Belgium's potato growers, now lacking customers.
title: Coronavirus: Belgians urged to eat more chips by lockdown-hit potato growers
title_page: Coronavirus: Belgians urged to eat more chips by lockdown-hit potato growers - BBC News
maintext: "In this way, part of the potato stock will still be used and we can avoid seeing excellent food, for which our farmers have worked so hard, being lost," Flemish Agriculture Minister Hilde Crevits told the Brussels Times.
